website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Iconia A1-830 is a sleek and simple tablet for basic use, but you need only spend $50 more to upgrade to a slate with faster performance and better features.
pros: The $179 Acer Iconia A1-830 is stylishly thin and performs consistently smoothly during casual use
With a smooth aluminum back, it feels solid yet comfortable to hold, and it has a microSD card expansion slot
cons: It runs an older version of Android
performance lags if multiple apps are open or if multitasking
the screen resolution is low for today's standards
it no longer offers a micro-HDMI port

website_summaries.verdict: The Acer Iconia A1-830 is notable for how closely it hews to the iPad mini's design, but it's also a serviceable budget-friendly Android tablet in its own right.

customer_reviews.title: wifi issues...AGAIN!  updated review dated Oct 2014
customer_reviews.text: From June 2014: I like most everything about this tablet. The camera is so-so but that feature wasn't important to me. My chief complaint is that it is not picking up my WiFi unless I stand right by the router. It isn't the router bc our laptops and two other tablets (a Surface and a Kindle Fire) get the signal anywhere in the house. October 2014: I replaced the original unit in June. It has worked great and now I am experiencing the same issue as I did with the first unit. Frustrating. I really love this little tablet. Acer is having me send the unit to their TX repair service center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acer Iconia A1-830
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size screen and the device is fast. What I really like about this device is the way Acer partitions the storage space. I get to use to entire remaining storage space after Android OS. This was an issue on my previous tablet where apps were running out of space because of small "Apps" partition. Even though I was able to move apps to SD, app installation could still be an issue if the "Apps" partition didn't have enough space during installation. Furthermore, Acer is truly showing commitment to supporting this device. The device received OTA KitKat upgrade 3 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for under $200
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for under $200. Better size than the comparable Samsung Galaxy for less money, plus looks & works great. However,we bought one for another family member & theirs won't retain Wifi passwords. We are constantly having to sign that one back into the Wifi, very annoying! Also, I still can't figure how to get the main screen to show temperature in Fahrenheit instead of Celsius even though the setting is in Fahrenheit! One last annoying thing is the speakers are on the back instead of the front, so the sound isn't very good without external speakers. Other than that, can't complain, I'm very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Neracat

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT FOR THE MONEY.  HOPE IT LASTS.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to tablet ownership, but my wife has a second generation Kindle Fire to go with our Amazon Prime account and there is no comparison, Kindle operates much smoother and faster. But buyers need to be aware of the difference in the two tablets. Also the operating systems are a little different despite Kindles Android based system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That had a good review too
customer_reviews.text: So far it has surpassed the Coby I basically got screwed on. . That had a good review too. . The Acer is obviously a nice little tablet. It knocks me off FB and my games occasionally and obviously wants me to install a hundred other 'things' that I don't understand. I'm working my way through it all gradually. Eventually hope to be able to sync phone an laptop too. I'm just not technologically gifted so it takes time and so many different sign ons for everything!! Not necessary in my opinion. But I think I have the little tablet that can and I'm enjoying learning with it. Good investment for such as me.
customer_reviews.author: apsat

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bouget this fire my son for his birthday. He loves it, my wife and I both have used it at times and I'd have to say it is possibly the best electronic item we have bought in years. My wife is not a techno nut like me but after using it for the first time she made the statement that she might like one also. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Works and functions as expected. Was purchased as a gift and the recipient loves it . So far nothing but positive things to say about this Tablet. Feels solid and runs fast, connects to wi-fi,hot spot,bluetooth just fine.takes great pics,battery holds charge really well even when playing videos, not too big and not too small. Have not installed many apps however the ones installed do work as expected. This Tablet has the Intel Dual-Core Atom Z2560 Processor and was the one recommended by the local sales rep at a computer store over the other tablets in this price range. Amazon had the best price this time.
customer_reviews.author: tx-lonestar1989

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap iPad knock-off, a look-alike replica on the surface. It's unsophisticated, but it works fine for my needs. Streaming videos on Netflix drains the battery at an alarming rate. An hour and a half at best. It does look good though, identical to the iPad mini. Figuring out the Android operating system is a learning curve. It gets the job done. I just wanted it for web browsing and portable movie watching. I put a bunch of movies into a microSD card and it works fine. I'm not dissatisfied with the product, I researched extensively before I bought it. I just wish it had a better battery. I guess it's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: R&M Torres

customer_reviews.title: It should have been a competitor for the iPad Mini but Acer blew it.
customer_reviews.text: Pros - wider aspect ratio means easier to read webpages and more real estate for games. Quality feel, expandable memory via MicroSD cards Cons - dim display. Short lived battery, can't root it (yet), Bloatware I bought this for my 90 year old mom to play her solitaire card games on, check Facebook to see pictures of her kids, grandkids and great grandkids and its barely fast enough. I'm hoping someone will figure out how to root this so I can see if I can get better performance. (not blazing performance, just better than the stuttering performance it has now)
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Acer tablet I have bought to share with my kids. As an android person, I love its easy to use operating system. The battery life is absolutely fantastic and way better than my Kindle Fire. The sound is very good for video, but my husband had some issues with it on HBO Go, which I rapidly told him was not the tablet's issue. The only problem I've found is no one sells a kids bumper for it, protection for it has been difficult to find but if you want something slim, Finite makes a nice fitting case.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my kitchen to read my recipes without having to waste paper by printing them all out. My laptop is just too bulky. That is really all i have used it for and in that limited capacity it works wonderfully. It has really good battery life and the graphics are good. I would buy it again if I had it to do over again.
customer_reviews.author: cbear

customer_reviews.title: I loved that one initially
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after I accidentally broke the Acer A1-810 tablet that I owned. I loved that one initially, before it began to slow down. However, this one is even better. This one is the newer version of the older one. While having the same size viewing screen, it's actually smaller and thinner. The only negative is that this one doesn't have the HDMI-out that the other one had. But I like this one even more. I can put this one in my pocket. (Don't do that, though! That's how I broke my other one)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ellis

customer_reviews.title: I love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest tablet i have ever owned. The battery life is long and consistent. I can use it for upwards of 5 hours before recharging. The images on the screen are sharp, crisp and colorful. The camera takes beautiful pictures. Best of all, I dropped it and lost the internet connection, send it to the repair center under warranty and had it back within a week. Not every tablet will be there for tech support, this companywill have my business in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Deplorable

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these, one for myself, the others as gifts. After 4 months use, myself and the 3 giftees collectively are dissappointed. We have all experienced random wifi connection loss for no apparent reason, frozen screens, keyboard problems, and charging problems. At first I was impressed and the price was good, but having annoying, spoartic problems with all 4 has been dissappointing and has steered us all away from buying any more Acer prroducts.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for its price!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I am really impressed on this little one! Can't compare to any other android tablets I've used before, the specs says it all don't expect and iPad quality. The Acer iconia A1-830 stands firm with its competitors u can't beat the price!! Really enjoy using it, haven't been able to put it down I bought two one for myself and another one for my little niece I know she's going to like it as much as I do! Works great multitasking, very snappy in opening apps. Screen does not lag at all great sensastivty. The only bad thing I found on this tablet was the speakers its equipped with but u can't complain for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Great tab
customer_reviews.text: Best tab I ever had, it works well. I past it on to my mother and its years later and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Abby S.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter tablet
customer_reviews.text: A great entry or medium tablet. Just want more lasting battery. Photo quality was okay. Slow on downloading. Took on vacation and was just the perfect item to keep in touch and for photos. Fit in my purse so no extra bag to carry. Bought powerbank to go with tablet. Had ample power for a week in a foreign country
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: More than what I expected, clear quality, fast response, many customization choices, variety of options and apps to choose from, nice battery life, small and convenient to travel with and overall just a great item. The more expensive ipads/ tablets are going to have to step it up because with tablets like this, who needs to spend $500 on something that does and looks the same as something for $100-$150? Great product, will buy another for my son.
customer_reviews.author: RedGalStr8

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this tablet for speed
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this tablet for speed, good screen resolution, size and ease of use, has all the features that a first time tablet buyer needs , dual cameras, wifi, bluetooth , long battery life. Do not waste your time or money on 6 and 7 inch screens as I have in the past, you will enjoy this for your first tablet or an inexpensive spare..
customer_reviews.author: Reg5559

customer_reviews.title: Excellent refurbished unit-worked and looked like new
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this refurbished Tablet for my Grand-kid. At the time this was my 6th purchase of the exact same tablet, though this is a refurbished tablet. Worked like new right out of the box. No problems with the unit, grand-son loves the tablet. He has vision problems so he likes the larger tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Doberdeb

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids if you dont expect it to last.
customer_reviews.text: Not a long lasting option but you get what you pay for on this one. Acer, normally a top quality brand at an affordable price missed the mark on these. We have 2 that have both had charging issues, now they are paper weights.
customer_reviews.author: K DeSilva

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: It started having issues after six months (of EXTREMELY light use). The tablet started to become unresponsive and would not turn on. Warrantied. After waranty the button to lock the screen doesn't work... Also the screen already has burn marks when you can get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: KatWy7172

customer_reviews.title: It works great. I got an extra memory card and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and no regrets. It works great. I got an extra memory card and it is just perfect. I would recommend to anyone. I think its a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tablet it's super crystal clear
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet it's super crystal clear. Was bought for my 9 year old she cherish this tablet this was her birthday gift and it arrived on time. I really thinking of getting another and sell my ipad As this is android I like this tablet it's amazingly clear and the price can't beat it. My ipad I paid over 300. And everything I do requires a payment. I'm definitely switching to one .
customer_reviews.author: kayren

customer_reviews.title: Only had 3 months but its AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: LOVED LOVED LOVED my acer tablet until about 2 weeks ago, my WiFi stopped working. I have to now look into how to use my warranty. This is an amazing Tablet for the price, everything was working smoothly and loads quickly I have had no other issues with my tablet but find it annoying since I"ve had it only 3 months. I'm very impressed with it I just hope I can get my WiFi working again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gee

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice tablet but it is slow as molasses and the ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a nice tablet but it is slow as molasses and the battery drains like hot grease out of a skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Sanders

customer_reviews.title: well built and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Has been a great tablet. Very well built, and I like the aspect ratio of the screen. Unlike most tablets which have a widescreen ratio useful for watching media, the ratio of this tablet (similar to an ipad mini) is I think more suitable for reading ebooks and general use such as web browsing and checking email. I only wish it was more easily rootable, but otherwise it's a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: E&R

customer_reviews.title: simple study tool
customer_reviews.text: Works great for studying, checking emails, checking homework stuff. I don't use it for typing or note taking. The camera is terrible. I bought it mainly to study (quizlet) when I'm on the go or at a friend's house. You can download office suite for free to view power points and word documents too.
customer_reviews.author: Vulpix

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: i love this tablet. perfect for my needs. so glad i didn't spend hundreds more on an ipad. it's good size too, was going to get the new fire one for $99 but that one is much smaller. this has a big screen and works much faster than my laptop. super cute the only down side is i can only find one case for it and its boring black.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don't recognize the micro sd memory.. Touch screen upper left corner does not work
customer_reviews.author: JOSE M VAZQUEZ R

customer_reviews.title: exceptional value for an 8-inch 4x3 tablet
customer_reviews.text: 8-inch tablets with 4x3 form factor are rare. The Acer A1-830 is lighter and smaller than the A1-810, with better screen color, but without micro hdmi port. Pro: inexpensive 8-inch tablet with sufficiently good screen and performance. Micro SD card slot, micro usb port. Plenty of third party, well-designed yet inexpensive cases. Adequate stereo sound. Con: no micro hdmi port, screen resolution is not high (but adequate for browsing.)
customer_reviews.author: imind

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to know what it was like to read on it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has the Ipad's display ratio, 4:3. I wanted to know what it was like to read on it. It worked fine for that. But it is a no-thrills tablet. It suffers by comparison to my favorite Samsungs. The touch screen is a little unresponsive. The battery life is a little less than I would like as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lange

customer_reviews.title: positively surprized, screen brightness is good, fast, cheap, looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: 5 star because it was unbelievably cheap and I am comparing it to similarly priced ones; it is not as good as ipad mini, but the price difference also makes up this. positively surprized, screen brightness is good, fast, cheap, looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: bb23

customer_reviews.title: Good for now
customer_reviews.text: Came very fast about 4 days after ordering it. Comes in box with protective plastic everywhere. Only has charging unit and USB cable, feels like not much in box but I guess that is all it is supposed to come with. Some white fluff stuff on plastic so I'm glad it wasnt on the tablet. Overall good, will update with performance and ease of use after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tablet! The price enticed me and I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tablet! The price enticed me and I haven't had a single regret yet. The 16 GB memory has given me plenty of space to save my apps. I've been using the rear camera to scan bar codes to track my food and it has without issue. (This is my first tablet, so I might be a bit biased.)
customer_reviews.author: ceruleantear

customer_reviews.title: I thought they all worked like that; however
customer_reviews.text: From day one the charging system has not worked properly. Having never had a tablet, I thought they all worked like that; however, this product is a dud - as time goes by the problem has gotten worse. It no longer charges above 57%. Even though it has a year warranty and that has not expired, I am not allowed to return it or get my money back. I am now stuck with a tablet that does not work. My advice - don't buy ACER.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope Acer solved the problem with an update. ...
customer_reviews.text: I hope Acer solved the problem with an update.The battery and battery life are real problems. Recharging can be very slow, or not functional at all, and discharging can be disconcertingly fast. Sometimes the unit will discharge itself to nearly empty after only a few hours on standby.The battery issue means that you cannot be away very long from a wall outlet. A couple of hours of use and bang, the thing needs to go back onto the recharger.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet, However
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet, However, as I have increase my useage over other devices, I realize battery life is limited. Lucky to get a couple of hours on battery. Great for quick e-mails, limited browsing on internnet. not great to do word processing. Keyboard could be better.
customer_reviews.author: James Downing

customer_reviews.title: excellent tablet for the price!
customer_reviews.text: one of the best tablets I've come across so far. response is fast, videos show in excellent quality, internet connection is quick. I can browse from page to page with no slow issues. I would highly recommend this tablet, it serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: maribel sanchez

customer_reviews.title: amazing tablet for amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these tablets for my daughters and they are well used and loved. They do not glitch, even with heavy use. We have had them for a good period of time now, and have had no issues. they are light, and fit easily in a cross body bag. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luvinfunkyworm

customer_reviews.title: looks great, works great and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: When I received it I was amazed by the way it looks it looks great and feels smooth it's thin and solid. the screen is pretty good but not the best , the device is very responsive it is fast enough to handle heavy games , no bugs , the battery is fine the speakers are awesome but if you like to take pictures use your smartphone or your digital camera but it takes nice pictures and works great on Skype. This device is the best you can get for less money . it looks great and work great and the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jacob kuba

customer_reviews.title: I love it so much I decided to buy 3 more ...
customer_reviews.text: WTF!!! I bought this tablet on Oct. 16th. I love it so much I decided to buy 3 more for my kids but I see the price went up 30 dollars and it doesn't even have the newest OS! I guess I'll wait 'til closer to Christmas to see if I can get it cheaper somewhere else. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: TheDrunkGardener

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift and still playing with it but love it. It does what I need it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and still playing with it but love it. It does what I need it to do. It is very fast and the size makes it easily portable, The pictures are clear and crisp. Videos are great along with the sound quality. I am not real technical but am super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn. Waseline

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet worth more than the price, which seems to have increased after i got i guess that is because of increase in want of the product. Not much of an Ipad fan cause of bluetooth transfers which makes sharing of documents between mu devices easy. Good intel processor, but i think the touch could have been better. But overall give it a 95. This comment is 6 months after getting it, still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: O O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version but it suffered some damage and I lost some pixels. Then I tried the 720 but found it too small. This new version is awesome! Juist right and it seems to have the power that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Custome

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE THIS TABLET IS BETTER THAN SAMSUNG. CAMERA(5MP), PROCESSOR, RAM(1GB), HDD(16gb). SCREENN(8 INCHS). tHE BEST TABLET FOR THE PRICE. i RECOMMEN YOU
customer_reviews.author: MILTON

customer_reviews.title: love these. holds several games
customer_reviews.text: bought 2. love these. holds several games. faster than any other tablet i have had. it has never told me it cant hold anymore games like all the tablets before it (that i gave away to little kids cause they were slow and no memory)
customer_reviews.author: jordan moore

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I use my tablet everyday and love it. My only complaint is with the poor sound quality of the speakers. Even so, it is a great tablet for the price. I highly recommend it if perfect sound is not your highest priority.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Z

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I received this product very on time, nice wrapped, it looks excellent. I just set it up, but it is going to South America for a new user as a gift. Will keep another post in a couple of months to see how it is doing. Highly recommend this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Floris M. Chowenhill

customer_reviews.title: WiFi basically non-existant
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this. For the money I paid I expected the WiFi to work on this, but it doesn't. We have a very good router, but with this device, my daughter can't go more than 2 feet from the router without it losing connection. What's the point of a tablet that doesn't have internet?
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Doty

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for a reasonable price. Adequate storage & cpu, Upgrades immediately to the latest Android revision. Quick setup, easy to use. GPS a plus!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chase

customer_reviews.title: Great Value in Tablets!
customer_reviews.text: The previous Acer Iconia model I had came with a micro HDMI, which I liked, but this one does not. The 2.0 mp front camera is a significant improvement.
customer_reviews.author: JAik

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A problem​ with the wifi module. It gets disconnected inside.
customer_reviews.author: JapP

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. A little slower than a pricier model in my opinion, but works well for emailing and light Internet use.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: it's good buy. The camera is horrible though
customer_reviews.text: If you're buying it only for the purposes of reading and games, it's good buy. The camera is horrible though. I've had it for 2 years and it's still holding up (knock on wood).
customer_reviews.author: AKA

customer_reviews.title: This is rotten piece of junk. I had problems ...
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old son has had problems with it charging well after only three weeks. I think it went completely out of power and was out of commission for a couple days before he was even able to turn it on, but now it is charging again. Not sure if he does not plug in all the way. You Lesson learned... Do not let this item go so low on power or recovery will be much longer than you hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Natty Bumpo

customer_reviews.title: Screen stops responding to touch.
customer_reviews.text: Was hopeful as it is a nice tablet, but the screen becomes unresponsive to touch, and has to be powered off to work again. Have returned, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Never ordered this on my account and no one had permission
customer_reviews.text: Never ordered this on my account and no one had permission to do so.
customer_reviews.author: MARY M BROWN

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great! The tablet is fast
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great! The tablet is fast, and the size is good. If you are willing to spend more money you can certainly get a higher resolution screen on another tablet, but if you can get it for <$100 it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boone

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine until recently the tablet stopped charging. I am very careful while charging it. It looks like a burned out charge port.
customer_reviews.author: Hiep Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: I really don't have anything to compare my tablet to seeing how this is my first tablet. After reading the reviews I decided to order this Acer Iconia and I must say I do not regret my choice, Very easy to use and the perfect size for what I want it for. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Samsung....Acer didn't last 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, then after 3 months it wouldn't connect to wifi. Had to do a factory reset, so I lost all my data. Now just after 6 months of owning it, it won't charge. So now it's totally useless. It should last longer than 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: jainman

customer_reviews.title: i was very glad to buy that for my little girl and we ...
customer_reviews.text: i was very glad to buy that for my little girl and we both were very satisfied. but it is more than a month that we have charging problem, either the charger is problematic itself or the tablet has that problem, please write to me if anyone has the same problem....
customer_reviews.author: ekaterine

customer_reviews.title: This tablet has become my favorite way to surf the net
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has become my favorite way to surf the net. It is faster and smoother than my Vista desk top or I pad generation 1. The size might be considered small until you see how smooth it scrolls after you make the screen expand. I think this has made me want a chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Del Hardegree

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet, and a very good price. May not be the fastest tablet out there, but it suits my needs well. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean North

customer_reviews.title: cheap product build very cheap not worth spend penny on it
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money . charger cheap stop working after 2 month . it wont charge anymore . I should've spend few dollar more and get a quality tablet . I guess you get what you pay for $ 139.00 wasted on a very low quality product .
customer_reviews.author: Rahal

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Tablet arrived and functioned really well for 3 weeks. The tablet stopped downloading and just continued to cycle instead of allowing information to download. So far they accepted the tablet to be returned. Just awaiting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Liam Jhon

customer_reviews.title: Bad charging port
customer_reviews.text: Only had this tablet 6-8 months and charging port went bad Will not charge .more to have fixed than worth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: THIS TABLET IS EVERYTHING!! I love everything about it! NO COMPLAINTS I can't even believe it's so cheap because it's a really great tablet
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very impressed with this tablet. Its battery is decent, though it doesn't last as long as my previous tablet. Still, it lasts a solid 8 hrs or so. The screen is clear and crisp, and the sound is quite nice. I actually like the size, as odd as it is.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Freaking fantastic tablet. Much faster than a Nexus 7 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Freaking fantastic tablet. Much faster than a Nexus 7 and my wife loves it. Looks great too boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tablet for husband as a birthday gift and he really likes it. It has a nice clear screen and good battery life for the price. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wellmeier

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to buy a tablet?
customer_reviews.text: This Acer tablet is great!! Kindle makes reading books fun and easy. I now only use my cell for calls. Much easier to do banking, email and web stuff on this. For the price, good investment and for me, perfect size. Also, fast and can get all APS on this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Don H.

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement to my Samsung galaxy 2 tab that was 7". I love that the viewing screen is bigger without being too big too good. Its also very light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the tablets but they seem to freeze randomly. Otherwise great product!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The tablet arrived in a timely manner and in great condition. At Christmas and with few available it ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet arrived in a timely manner and in great condition. At Christmas and with few available it was priced well, and my granddaughter was delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: I love it, works great and is pretty responsive
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tablet to date, so I did not want to spend a lot of money. I love it, works great and is pretty responsive. I would buy Acer again.
customer_reviews.author: billiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Is that an Ipad?
customer_reviews.text: All the time I get people ask me if it is an IPAD... It is not my first ACER equipment. I also have a laptop for my Little girl.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: modern design
customer_reviews.text: it is fast and versatile, with a modern design. The package arrived immediately. I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AlexDario

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its just as good as the more expensive names out there. $400 quality for less than $200.
customer_reviews.author: ace in hole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item was just as advertised and the price was right. Ken Webmaster aboutfacts.org
customer_reviews.author: Ken Webmaster Truth Facts Net

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband (who is technologically impaired) loves his tablet. Easy to use. Beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience
customer_reviews.text: It sucks! Never charges Updating the system is impossible! Please DONT WASTE YOUR PRECIOUS HARDEARNED Money on this Tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. wish it came with a screen protector, since they dont make one for it.
customer_reviews.author: Casslore

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet ... Its definitely worth buying the price makes it better, hands down get this tablet or be a fool
customer_reviews.author: Tyquan Woods

customer_reviews.title: at first I thought wow good for the price
customer_reviews.text: at first I thought wow good for the price. it worked perfectly fine, I only used it 3 times, and I come back to charge it and it wont charge it is a total waste of money that I wish I could get back. It is to late to return it. All I have to say is DO NOT BUY THIS AT ALL DO NOT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Serantoni

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet. Resolution could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet. Resolution could be better, but for $100 its great.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic tablet for the price! It's totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and just what I was looking for without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing and recommend it to everyone. Easy to use and just the right size. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, works awesome..if only it would have lasted!
customer_reviews.text: I give only a one star ONLY because I ordered one within two weeks it wouldnt charge anymore...so I just figured I was the lucky one that got a bad charger or the defective Tablet, so I ordered another after I returned the first one. When I recieved the second one, all was well and this time it only took 1 wk. For it to stop charging exact same problem. I absolutly Loved the tablet was so disappointed that it didnt work long. It is very good quality if it would have only worked for longer than two weeks. Thankfully I was reimbursed both times no issues. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Serena Renee Foran

customer_reviews.title: like.
customer_reviews.text: I like it for shopping and looking up things while in my chair
customer_reviews.author: Alan Chaney

customer_reviews.title: good screen , good speed , good system , good price , good looking ;)
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the device very much, that is until the Acer (explore beyond limits -tm) start up screen froze onto it. The only way to get the screen off was to drain the battery. Then fully charge the tablet. Turn it on. Try to HARD REBOOT and then it freezes on the command system with it saying something about a argument with the request dealing with the system reboot/factory restore. I learned that your tablet can be in a argument with its self.........I still love the product. I just got a lemon I guess.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price / value for a nice tablet
customer_reviews.text: This was bought as a gift to someone. The receiver is extremely happy. Set up was very easy and works flawlessly. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, good performance and excellent service to
customer_reviews.text: Nice product , good performance and excellent service to deliverded
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Works well..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, It's my first android device so I am still learning..
customer_reviews.author: Pineair AZ

customer_reviews.title: I like this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I like this tablet. It has the features that I use every day. Music, weather, sports, decent camera and you can ask it a question and it answers. Not too bad for a $120
customer_reviews.author: James Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great overall for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 yr old to play games on, it has seemed to work really well. Delivery was good and on time, product was overall a great buy, the touch sensitivity sometimes while playing games doesnt act like it reconizes your touches in fast motion. But good tablet for my purchase needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Rodney Covington Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine and less than half the price of an iPad mini.
customer_reviews.author: joel fisher

customer_reviews.title: Nice For Price
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far.For the price and apps it comes with I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Akiraneo

product_meta.title: Acer Iconia A1-830-1633 7.9-Inch Tablet (Silver)
product_meta.description:
Acer Iconia A1-830-1633 Tablet comes with these high level Specs: Intel Atom Processor Dual-Core Z2560, Android Jelly Bean Operating System, 7.9" XGA 1024 x 768 resolution, IPS LCD with LED-backlight with integrated 5-point capacitive touch screen - supporting finger touch and image auto rotation, Integrated Power VR SGX 544MP2 Graphics, 1024MB LPDDR2 Memory, 16GB Internal Storage, 802.11b/g/n Wireless, Bluetooth 3.0, 2MP Front-facing camera, 5MP rear-facing HD camera, 1 - Micro USB 2.0 Port, Rechargeable Lithium-ion Prismatic Battery, Up to 7.5-hours Battery Life, .83 lbs. | 380g (tablet only). Intel, the Intel logo, Intel Atom and Intel Atom Inside are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Android 4.2 Jelly Bean (Upgradable to Android 4.4 Kit Kat when available)
Intel Dual-Core Atom Z2560 Processor (1.6 GHz, 1MB Cache)
16 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB LPDDR2 Memory
